entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Camrose
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Camrose 7:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Fog. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
